name: Proof of Concept Island
description:
Hello,

Thank you for taking interest in Proof of Concept Island! This is first and foremost a proof of concept. This means that this is a short experience that is intended for players to get their hands on the game's mechanics and give feedback so they can be adjusted and improved upon for a full game release!

If you play the game please be sure to give feedback as that is the primary purpose of this game.

Once again thank you for taking part and I can't wait to hear from you.
